typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BrewName as string,
		DateStarting as date,
		LastUpdated_Source as timestamp,
		TimeLine as string,
		Section as string,
		FlowMeasure as string,
		Area as string,
		UOM as string,
		Value as double,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		SourceLine as long,
		PeriodDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT BrewName,DateStarting,LastUpdated_Source,TimeLine,Section,FlowMeasure,Area,UOM,Value,LastUpdated,SourceLine,PeriodDate FROM ODS.vwSD_Levers_ETL0"),
	format: 'query') ~> SDLeversOut2
source(output(
		SiteName as string,
		DateAdjust as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> vwDateAdjustLookup2
SDLeversOut2 derive(DateAdjust = snkDateAdjust2#lookup(BrewName).DateAdjust,
		LastUpdated1 = currentTimestamp(),
		TimeLine_tr = trim(TimeLine),
		fkBatch = toInteger(0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 keyGenerate(output(pkiSDLevers as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
vwDateAdjustLookup2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	keys:['SiteName'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		SiteName,
		DateAdjust
	)) ~> snkDateAdjust2
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		pkiSDLevers as long,
		BrewName as string,
		DateStarting as date,
		LastUpdated_Source as timestamp,
		TimeLine as string,
		Section as string,
		FlowMeasure as string,
		Area as string,
		UOM as string,
		Value as double,
		fkBatchID as integer,
		LastUpdated as timestamp,
		LastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLine as long,
		PeriodDate as date,
		PeriodAdjust as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'yyyy/MM/dd',
	timestampFormat:'yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		pkiSDLevers,
		BrewName,
		DateStarting,
		LastUpdated_Source,
		TimeLine,
		Section,
		FlowMeasure,
		Area,
		UOM,
		Value,
		fkBatchID = fkBatch,
		LastUpdated = LastUpdated1,
		SourceLine,
		PeriodDate,
		PeriodAdjust = DateAdjust
	)) ~> StagingSink2
